sentences.en: a city of six million inhabitants
A native or inhabitant of Assyria.
Belgian: a native or inhabitant of Belgium.
sentences.cn: 比利时人: 比利时人民或居民.

sentences.en: Bohemian: a native or inhabitant of Bohemia.
sentences.cn: 波希米亚人: 波希米亚本地人或居民.

sentences.en: Cairo has only thirteen square centimetres of green space for each inhabitant.
sentences.cn: 开罗居民的人均绿地面积仅13平方厘米。

sentences.en: Cruzan: a native or inhabitant of St. Croix in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
sentences.cn: 圣克罗伊人: 美属维尔京群岛圣克罗伊的本地人或居民.

sentences.en: Etruscan: a native or inhabitant of ancient Etruria.
sentences.cn: 伊特鲁里亚人: 古代伊特鲁里亚的本地人或居民.

sentences.en: Every inhabitant here has an obligation to pay taxes.
sentences.cn: 这里的每一位居民都有纳税的义务.

sentences.en: Every inhabitant of this planet must contemplate that it may no longer be habitable.
sentences.cn: 世界上每个人都必须思考到地球上可能不再适合人住的那一天.

sentences.en: Gather up your bundle from the ground, O inhabitant under siege.
sentences.cn: 17受围困的居民哪,从地上收拾你的包袱罢.

sentences.en: Islander points to inhabitant of an island.
sentences.cn: 岛民是指岛屿上的居民.

sentences.en: No wonder there is a tension between habitat and inhabitant.
sentences.cn: 无怪乎居民和他们的居住环境之间会有矛盾了.

sentences.en: The inhabitant of the island is friendly.
The local inhabitant do not like noisy tourist in summer.
sentences.cn: 当地居民不喜欢夏季喧闹的游客.

sentences.en: the oldest inhabitant of the village
Therefore themajority inhabitant family can withstand food rise in price theinfluence.
sentences.cn: 因此大多数居民家庭可以承受食品价格上涨的影响.

words.tran_cn: 适于居住的；可居住的，可栖居的
居住，住所；有人居住的状态
占据（inhabit的过去分词）；居住于

trans.tran_cn: 居民，住户，（栖息在某地区的）动物
trans.tran_en: one of the people who live in a particular place
